name: River Fallers
description:
In this mobile arcade game your aim is to drop from log to log without missing any. if you accidentally mess up your footing you may plummet to your doom! See how high you can get your score and earn coins to buy new characters.

Drag the controller at the bottom to move the character.

CHARACTERS AND SHOP COMING VERY  SOON!

Google play: 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GDP.RiverFalling

Discord:

https://discord.gg/vTa8F7e
